Verses: 1 dhuraiththanangalukkum Adhigaarangalukkum Keezhppadindhu Adangiyirukkavum, Sagalavidhamaana Narkiriyaigalaiyum Seyya Aayaththamaayirukkavum,
2 oruvanaiyum Dhooshiyaamalum, Sandai Pannaamalum, Porumaiyullavargalaai Ellaa Manusharukkum Saandhagunaththaik Kaanbikkavum Avargalukku Ninaippoottu.

3 enenil, Murkaalaththile Naamum Buththiyeenarum, Keezhppadiyaadhavargalum, Vazhithappi Nadakkiravargalum, Palavidha Ichchaigalukkum Inbangalukkum. Adimaippattavargalum, Dhurkgunaththodum Poraamaiyodum Jeevanampannugiravargalum, Pagaikkappadaththakkavargalum, Oruvaraiyoruvar Pagaikkiravargalumaayirundhom.
4 nammudaiya Ratchagaraagiya Dhevanudaiya Dhayaiyum Manusharmelulla Anbum Pirasannamaanabodhu,
5 naam Seydha Needhiyin Kiriyaigalinimiththam Avar Nammai Ratchiyaamal, Thamadhu Irakkaththinpadiye, Marujenma Muzhukkinaalum, Parisuththa Aaviyinudaiya Pudhidhaakkudhalinaalum Nammai Ratchiththaar.
6 thamadhu Kirubaiyinaale Naam Needhimaangalaakkappattu, Niththiya Jeevan Undaagum Engira Nambikkaiyinpadi Sudhandharamaagaththakkadhaaga,
7 avar Namadhu Ratchagaraagiya Yesukiristhu Moolamaai, Andhap Parisuththaaviyai Nammel Sambooranamaaip Pozhindharulinaar.

8 indha Vaarththai Unmaiyulladhu; Dhevanidaththil Visuvaasamaanavargal Narkiriyaigalai Seyya Jaakkiradhaiyaayirukkumpadi Nee Ivaigalaikkuriththuth Thittamaaip Bodhikkavendumendru Virumbugiren; Ivaigale Nanmaiyum Manusharukkup Pirayojanamumaanavaigal.
9 buththiyeenamaana Tharkkangalaiyum Vamsavaralaarugalaiyum, Sandaigalaiyum, Niyaayappiramaanaththaikkuriththu Undaagira Vaakkuvaadhangalaiyum Vittu Vilagu; Avaigal Appirayojanamum Veenumaayirukkum.
10 vedhappurattanaayirukkira Oruvanukku Nee Irandorudharam Buththi Sonnapinbu Avanaivittu Vilagu.
11 appadippattavan Nilai Thavari, Thanniledhaane Aakkinaiththeerppudaiyavanaaip Paavanjseygiravanendru Arindhirukkiraaye.
12 naan Arththemaavaiyaavadhu Theegikkuvaiyaavadhu Unnidaththil Anuppumbodhu Nee Nikkoppolikku Ennidaththil Vara Jaakkiradhaippadu; Maarikaalaththile Ange Thangumpadi Theermaaniththirukkiren.
13 niyaayasaasthiriyaagiya Senaavukkum Appollovukkum Oru Kuraivumillaadhapadikku Avargalai Jaakkiradhaiyaai Visaariththu Vazhivittanuppu.
14 nammudaiyavargalum Kaniyatravargalaayiraadhapadi Kuraivugalai Neekkugiradharkedhuvaaga Narkiriyaigalai Seyyappazhagattum.
15 ennodirukkira Yaavarum Unakku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal. Visuvaasaththile Nammai Sinegikkiravargalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollu. Kirubaiyaanadhu Ungalanaivarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
